a.detail: The walls here have been engraved with incoherent labyrinths
a.summary: The walls here have been engraved with incoherent labyrinths

c.detail: Someone has scrawled "The Cohort of Hule killed a green dragon here" here
c.summary: Someone has scrawled "The Cohort of Hule killed a green dragon here" here

details.history: The dungeon was created by hobgoblins as a mine. It was eventually conquered by invaders, and has lain empty for many centuries until recently.
details.illumination: Shadowy (phosphorescent fungus or candles every 20 ft.)

monster: Treasure: 2500 cp, 900 sp, 30 gp, 2 x diamond (50 gp), carnelian (50 gp), citrine (50 gp), moonstone (50 gp), quartz (50 gp), sardonyx (50 gp), Spell Scroll (Unseen Servant) (common, dmg 200), Potion of Healing (common, dmg 187)
detail.room_features: Someone has scrawled "Seba died here" on the east wall, and a briny odor fills the north side of the room
trap:
Concealed Pit: DC 10 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    affects all targets entering a 10 ft. square area, DC 12 save or take 2d10 damage

north.desc: Stuck Stone Door (DC 20 to break; 60 hp)

south.desc: Locked Simple Wooden Door (DC 15 to open, DC 15 to break; 10 hp)

monster: Ogre Zombie (cr 2, mm 316) and 1 x Zombie (cr 1/4, mm 316); deadly, 500 xp

Treasure: 1700 cp, 800 sp, 50 gp, 4 x diamond (50 gp), bloodstone (50 gp), chalcedony (50 gp), chrysoprase (50 gp), 2 x sardonyx (50 gp), star rose quartz (50 gp), zircon (50 gp), Chime of Opening (rare, dmg 158), Decanter of Endless Water (uncommon, dmg 161), Oil of Etherealness (rare, dmg 183), Potion of Stone Giant Strength (rare, dmg 187)

east.desc: Locked Stone Door (DC 15 to open, DC 25 to break; 60 hp)

detail.room_features: A stone sarcophagus sits in the north side of the room, and several pieces of blood-soaked clothing are scattered throughout the room

north.desc: Stuck Simple Wooden Door (DC 10 to break; 10 hp)

south.desc: Stuck Stone Door (DC 20 to break; 60 hp)

west.desc: Unlocked Simple Wooden Door (10 hp) (slides up)

detail.room_features: The sound of horns can be heard in the south-west corner of the room, and several empty bottles are scattered throughout the room

monster: Bandit Captain (cr 2, mm 344) and 1 x Bandit (cr 1/8, mm 343); deadly, 475 xp
detail.room_features: An unexplained breeze can be felt in the center of the room, and a charred wooden shield lies in the south side of the room

north.desc: Stuck Good Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 15 hp)

south.desc: Stuck Strong Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 20 hp)

monster: Orc (cr 1/2, mm 246) and 1 x Half-ogre (cr 1, mm 238); deadly, 300 xp

Treasure: 1600 cp, 900 sp, 100 gp, 4 x diamond (50 gp), 2 x carnelian (50 gp), chalcedony (50 gp), Dust of Dryness (uncommon, dmg 166), Philter of Love (uncommon, dmg 184), Potion of Greater Healing (uncommon, dmg 187), Rope of Climbing (uncommon, dmg 197)
detail.room_features: A stream of blood flows along a channel in the floor, and someone has scrawled "Sabel's Fellowship killed a green dragon here" on the west wall

north.desc: Stuck Strong Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 20 hp)

south.desc: Locked Simple Wooden Door (DC 10 to open, DC 15 to break; 10 hp)
Stuck Simple Wooden Door (DC 10 to break; 10 hp)

west.desc: Stuck Strong Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 20 hp)
Stuck Strong Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 20 hp)

detail.room_features: Someone has scrawled "Sharpen thy spear and ready thy shield" in blood on the south wall, and several wax blobs are scattered throughout the room

west.desc: Stuck Stone Door (DC 20 to break; 60 hp)

wandering_monsters.1: Silver Dragon Wyrmling (cr 2, mm 118); deadly, 450 xp, scouting from another part of the dungeon
wandering_monsters.2: Ogre Zombie (cr 2, mm 316); deadly, 450 xp, wielding bizarre eldritch powers
wandering_monsters.3: Orc (cr 1/2, mm 246) and 1 x Half-ogre (cr 1, mm 238); deadly, 300 xp, gathered around an evil shrine
wandering_monsters.4: Bandit Captain (cr 2, mm 344) and 1 x Bandit (cr 1/8, mm 343); deadly, 475 xp, investigating a strange noise
wandering_monsters.5: Orc (cr 1/2, mm 246) and 1 x Half-ogre (cr 1, mm 238); deadly, 300 xp, returning to their lair with plunder
wandering_monsters.6: Gelatinous Cube (cr 2, mm 242); deadly, 450 xp, gathered around an evil shrine
